page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: There are two main road intersections on our block and we have surveyed both to find out what sort of vehicles pass through. Travellers Rest Roundabout, weekday 17.00 hours to 18.00 hours. 820 cars,120 vans,60-4 wheeled trucks,40 coaches,20-6 wheeled trucks,8 8 wheeled trucks and 17 articulated lorries. Dagnall Roundabout,weekday 16.30 hours to 17.30 hours. 119 cars,18 vans,10 pickup trucks,10-4 wheeled trucks,7-6 wheeled trucks,18-8 wheeled trucks,25 articulated lorries,5 motorbikes and 4 coaches.It was estimated that the heaviest traffic flow occured between 17.30 hours and 18.30 hours on a weekday.
